summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Puget Way Southwest, across a portion of Block 10, Supplemental Plat of Goodspeed Addition to West Seattle and the S 1/2 of reserve as platted in Goodspeed's Addition to West Seattle; and for the establishing of grades on said Puget Way Southwest; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of the necessary land, and for the right to construct slopes for cuts and fills on the adjoining property; and providing for payment from the City Street Fund.
